message: In this quest, the battle you fight will depend on the choices you make during the scenario.

In this quest, the battle you fight will depend on the choices you make during the scenario.
In addition, you will form your party immediately before the battle begins.

"The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" is a revival event.
If you have obtained a "Holy Grail" in a past "The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" event, it will be replaced with a "Crystallized Lore" for the revival.

CAUTION

"Door of Void: The Arrival of Seven Sins" is a quest that can be repeated multiple times. However, bond points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed once.

Warning:

"Cage of the Fallen" is not located anywhere within SE.RA.PH, and it's a High Difficulty side dungeon.
This dungeon is not a part of the Event Missions.

Would you like to proceed?

In this quest, you will form your party immediately before the battle begins.

Would you like to start the quest?

Warning:

[Ultra High Difficulty] Rematch at Reichenbach Falls is a repeatable quest. However, Bond Points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed the first time it is cleared.

Do you still wish to proceed?
The path splits in two. Which way to go...?[k]
There's a chilly presence. Something's coming...![k]
The moment you enter the room, a giant lizard slithers out![k]
There's a warm presence.[k]
The floor is nice and warm and cozy.[k]
Maidservants are waiting inside the room![k]
The pillar looks like it has scratch marks.[k]
There's animal fur on the floor.[k]
Howling can be heard from inside the room.[k]
A chimera is sitting inside the room looking cramped![k]
Something jolly seems to be inside the room.[k]
A giggling sound can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Lots of laughter can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Lots of maidservants are sitting inside the room![k]
There's a sweet scent.[k]
An eerie-sounding moan can be heard through the wall. Is there something behind it?[k]
After sliding open the fusuma, maidservants come out and start pressing themselves against you.[k]
You're surrounded by maidservants![k]
The sound of the shamisen can be heard.[k]
The sound of the shamisen echoes throughout the corridor, making it sound like chamber music.[k]
The sound of the shamisen abruptly stops the moment you stand in front of the room.[k]
The maidservants carrying shamisen suddenly ambush you![k]
The floor creaks as you walk. It seems to be old and damaged.[k]
There are footprints of something big and heavy passing by...[k]
A giant apparition was hiding at the end of the corridor![k]
It's a grandiose-looking fusuma that seems meant to receive important guests.[k]
A slew of maidservants are lined up inside the spacious room![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
The area is eerily quiet...[k]
It's so quiet, the sound of your footsteps is deafening...[k]
As if cutting through the silence, the sound of flapping wings can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Whoa, it's a wyvern![k]
It's dark, and you can't see ahead. Watch your step.[k]
After walking through the dark for so long, the room's light is blinding.[k]
After reaching the room without issue, you open the door without hesitation...and a wolf lunges at you![k]
The air feels heavy in this corridor...could it be smoke? It does look dark and black...[k]
This smoke seems choked with evil...it's hard to breathe...[k]
It's a runaway horse![k]
The floorboards are covered in patches of mold. Revolting.[k]
There are scurrying sounds coming from the ceiling... Could it be mice?[k]
The ceiling suddenly collapses, and a giant lizard falls through![k]
It's not cold...and yet there is a chill in the air.[k]
You're getting goosebumps. Maybe it's the strange chill in the corridor...[k]
Your body's trembling. Let's get out of here quick.[k]
You try to jog through the corridor, but a pale monster crawls out of a crack in the wall![k]
The wall is heavily damaged. It looks like a serious fight happened here...[k]
There are small and big scratches...[k]
A wolf carcass was lying on the side of corridor...but then a chimera appeared behind you![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
This corridor is magnificently crafted. You just want to admire it forever.[k]
The gold decoration on the fusuma is elegant and beautiful. Could this room be for someone [sr]important?[k]
The fusuma has been violently shredded.[k]
Sounds of clicking metal, like scissors, can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Inside the room, you find an empty hermit crab shell. But you swear something living was in the room a minute ago...[k]
The area is covered with slimy mucus.[k]
The mucus looks like it's flowing out of the room.[k]
There's an octopus jar...but it's empty.[k]
The floorboards seem to be rotted. It's dangerous because some areas are caved in.[k]
The floorboards are blistered, as if they've been melted by something. It looks like...a poisonous liquid.[k]
A squirming, writhing sound issues from within the room.[k]
A giant poison-spewing snake made a nest inside the room![k]
This corridor has a springiness that feels just right to the step.[k]
There's nobody inside the room, but there is something that looks like a bird's nest...[k]
You open the door and a big chicken rushes at you, snapping at your neck![k]
There's an inexplicably foul odor wafting through...[k]
It appears to be an intense smell of a beast...[k]
A fierce beast was kept inside the room![k]
A shiny, mirrored corridor. How much polish did it take to make it so shiny?[k]
It's so shiny, it's blinding. Let's be careful not to slip.[k]
Light floods out of the room...what in the world...?[k]
The room was full of maidservants in flashy outfits![k]
It looks like a newly restored corridor. The new wood smells nice.[k]
A big koi fish is painted on the fusuma.[k]
A long white line that looks like track markings is painted along the corridor. You feel compelled to run on it.[k]
You can't help but jog along the corridor. You don't want to lose this race![k]
Boars were cramped inside the room![k]
Is the floor slightly tilted? This corridor feels a bit unsettling.[k]
A screeching sound can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Monkeys were playing inside the room! Ooh ah ah!!![k]
This must be the last area of this floor! Let's hurry through.[k]
A familiar presence can be felt from inside the room... Now what could it be...[k]
The maidservants were redoing their makeup and waiting inside the room![k]
You're getting tired...but just a little more. Keep going.[k]
A sleepy growl can be heard from inside the room...[k]
